parameters.name: 脱力感のあるほのぼの日常

parameters: Since my sister called me over,
I walked straight into the bathroom
Well, she called me, after all.
can you bring me some more shampoo?"
My sister shyly poked her head out from the bathroom.
I quickly took the spare shampoo from
the cabinet and handed it to her.
I'll go finish up, see you in a bit~"

maybe I should just head back...

and I could still smell the scent of body wash on her.

I shouldn't tease her too much.
Better just get her the shampoo quickly.
I'll go finish up, see you in a bit~"
